audioText: Tu gagneras éventuellement ce concours incapable si tu continues à travailler avec cette conscience solide et cette approche britannique.
question: When will you win this challenging competition?
options: Eventually, if you continue working with solid conscience and British approach
Only if you change your current strategy completely
Never, because the competition is too difficult
explanation: The text states 'Tu gagneras éventuellement ce concours incapable si tu continues à travailler avec cette conscience solide et cette approche britannique' - You will eventually win this challenging competition if you continue working with solid conscience and British approach. 'Gagneras' is the future tense of 'gagner' (to win).
